member.name: M:Users.API.Read.Controllers.v1.UsersController.GetUser(System.Guid)
member.param: The unique identifier of the user
member.response: Success - OK - Returns the requested user
Success - No Content - No user matched the given identifier
Error - Bad Request - It was not possible to bind the request JSON

member.name: M:Users.API.Read.Controllers.v1.UsersController.GetUsers(Users.API.Models.Request.v1.GetPageOfUsersRequest)
member.param: A GetUsersRequest object which contains fields for paging, searching, filtering, sorting and shaping user data
member.response: Success - OK - Returns the requested page of users
Success - No Content - No users matched given criteria
Error - Bad Request - It was not possible to bind the request JSON
